name: Blue Team - Maritime Security Timeline
description: Injects for the Blue Team, focusing on maritime security and intelligence.

content.headline: Unidentified Vessels Detected Near Territorial Waters
content.body: Coast Guard reports multiple unidentified vessels approaching territorial boundaries. All port authorities have been placed on high alert. Defense forces monitoring situation closely.
Multiple ships just passed our fishing area moving fast toward the port. This isn't normal traffic. Something's up. #MaritimeSecurity #PortWatch

content.subject: URGENT: Radar Contact Alert - Multiple Vessels
content.body: Our coastal radar systems have detected 3 unidentified vessels on approach vector to port facility. ETA 15 minutes. Vessels not responding to hails. Recommend immediate tactical assessment and defensive posture.
INTERCEPTED MSG: Package arriving earlier than expected. Team ready at alternate entrance. Proceed with alpha protocol.
